sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-table
  append
    stripe
    lazy
    height="100%"
    highlight-current-row
    row-class-name="hot animate__animated animate__flipInX animate__delay-1s"
    :data="tbData"
    @current-change="handleCurrentChange()"
  >
    <el-table-column
      v-for="item in tbCols"
      :key="item.name"
      :prop="item.name"
      :label="item.label"
      :width="item.width"
    >
    </el-table-column>
  </el-table>
</template>

<script>
import { getAlbum } from "../api";
export default {
  name: "playList",
  data() {
    return {
      tbData: [
        
      ],
      tbCols: [
        {
          name: "index",
          label: "",
          width: 80,
        },

        {
          name: "title",
          label: "音乐标题",
          width: 350,
        },
        {
          name: "pop",
          label: "热度",
          width: 100,
        },
        {
          name: "singer",
          label: "歌手",
          width: 280,
        },
        {
          name: "album",
          label: "专辑",
          width: 300,
        },
        {
          name: "duration",
          label: "时长",
          width: 80,
        },
      ],
    };
  },
  computed: {},
  methods: {
    
    loadAll() {
     getAlbum(). then((response) => {
        let arr = response.data.data;
        this.tbData = arr.map((item,index) => {
          return Object.assign({
            index: index<9?'0'+(index+1):index+1,
            title: item.alias.length?item.name+'（'+item.alias+'）':item.name,
            pop: item.popularity,
            singer: item.artists[0].name,
            album: item.album.name,
            duration: this.timeFormt(item.bMusic.playTime),
          });
        });
       
      });
    },
    handleCurrentChange() {},

    timeFormt(value){
      
      value=Math.ceil(value/1000)
      let m=parseInt(value/60)
      let s=value%60
      return m+':'+s
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    
    this.loadAll();
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.hot{
  overflow: auto;
}
</style>
